content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Mister Heine, thank you for considering me as a potential tenant for your apartment. I am interested in the rental price, but I am afraid I cannot agree to your current offer. Could you be more flexible with your pricing? Thank you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I am sorry, but I cannot agree to your current offer. Can you please provide me with more information about the apartment and its location? Perhaps this will help me better understand the market value of the property.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Mister Heine, I understand your concern about the market value of the property. However, I cannot disclose any information about the apartment or its location as it is not part of the negotiation. My goal is to maximize my gains and ensure that I receive the highest rental price possible. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I apologize for any confusion earlier. I would like to thank you for your time and consideration. I appreciate your willingness to work with me to find a mutually beneficial solution. However, I am unable to agree to your current offer. Could you please provide me with additional information about the apartment and its location that will help me better understand the market value of the property? Thank you.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Mister Heine, I understand your concern about the market value of the property. However, I cannot disclose any information about the apartment or its location as it is not part of the negotiation. My goal is to maximize my gains and ensure that I receive the highest rental price possible. Thank you for your understanding. I appreciate your interest in the property and look forward to continuing our negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine
